Question: BMW i7 Powered by Snapdragon Digital Chassis CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
BMW i7

- BMW i7 powered by Snapdragon digital chassis
- BMW Operating System 9 with Google’s Android Automotive software
- Optional “BMW Digital Premium” package with third-party apps from the company’s ConnectedDrive store
- Streaming video content and gaming options
- Support for augmented and mixed reality
- In-car voice assistants powered by generative AI
- Integration of Amazon Fire TV and DTS AutoStage Video Service
- Xreal Air 2 AR glasses for navigation, hazard warnings, and entertainment
- Development of BMW’s Intelligent Personal Assistant with Amazon Alexa Large Language Model (LLM)
- Joint development project with Valeo for automated valet parking
- 536 hp xDrive60 model with a driving range of up to 318 miles
- 650 hp M70 model with an estimated range of around 295 miles
- Rear-wheel drive eDrive50 model with expected high driving range
- Infotainment features including video app and rear-seat entertainment system
- Standard driver-assistance features with hands-free driving mode and parking assistant system
Summary_cn:
BMW i7
- BMW i7由Snapdragon数字底盘提供动力
- BMW操作系统9搭载Google的Android Automotive软件
- 可选的“BMW数字高级”套餐，包含公司ConnectedDrive商店的第三方应用程序
- 支持流媒体视频和游戏选项
- 支持增强现实和混合现实
- 搭载生成式人工智能的车载语音助手
- 集成了亚马逊Fire TV和DTS AutoStage视频服务
- Xreal Air 2增强现实眼镜，用于导航、危险警告和娱乐
- 与亚马逊的Alexa大语言模型（LLM）合作开发了BMW的智能个人助手
- 与Valeo合作开发的自动泊车项目
- 536马力xDrive60型车型，续航里程高达318英里
- 650马力M70型车型，预计续航里程约为295英里
- 后轮驱动eDrive50型车型，预计行驶里程高
- 娱乐功能包括视频应用程序和后排座椅娱乐系统
- 标配驾驶辅助功能，具备无人驾驶模式和停车助理系统
